类 CompoundJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • Job
      • CompoundJob
  • 所有已实现的接口:

    public class CompoundJob
extends Job
    components of a compound job file
    作者:
    Bruce Dong

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      CompoundJob(int profit, Job... subJobs)
      Stores basic information of a job

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CompoundJob

        public CompoundJob(int profit,
                   Job... subJobs)
        Stores basic information of a job
        参数:
        profit - total payment of all jobs
        subJobs - each sub job

    • 方法详细资料
